oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - American Ace - 1948-01-17 - Excerpts 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from an American Ace sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (7:30-8:00 pm) from January 17, 1948. Featuring Roy Acuff, fiddler Tommy (likely Jackson or Magness), Pap, and special guests Governor Melvin Thompson of Georgia, Governor William Tuck of Virginia, and Governor Jim McCord of Tennessee. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff and Governor Melvin Thompson talk -- Roy Acuff and Governor William Tuck talk -- Roy Acuff and Governor Jim McCord talk
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Acuff, Roy; Thompson, M. E. (Melvin Ernest), 1903-1980; Tuck, William M. (William Munford), 1896-1983; McCord, Jim Nance; Wilson, Lonnie;
